pkgmetadata.longdescription: ![GitHub tag (latest by date)](https://img.shields.io/github/v/tag/tandav/dagops)# dagopsdag/task runner## install### install from [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/dagops/)```shpip install dagops```### or install the latest version from github```shpip install git+https://github.com/tandav/dagops```### development```shpip install -e .[dev]```
